data.text: @caulmick @irishdailymail As a qualified mechanical engineer does he have the knowledge of health issues to be concerned or does he need an advisor to advise him to be concerned?

@Dfitzy84 @caulmick @irishdailymail No I associate long covid with infection. Severity of affects of both acute and long covid have been shown time and time again to be less in vaccinated.

Many of the adverse affects that have been seen in vaccinated cohort are at rates much less than from actual infection.
@LukeColeman89 @caulmick @irishdailymail So do u associate long covid with been vaccinated??

@Dfitzy84 @caulmick @irishdailymail If you wanna talk about vaccination and long covid this evidence probably more what you are looking for

https://t.co/BWVTMM11g7
@LukeColeman89 @caulmick @irishdailymail So we're are the details of these subjects been vaccinated r unvaccinated I think that is very important component missing in this article IMO

@Dfitzy84 @caulmick @irishdailymail No I mean the actually data around Long covid not to mention the damage caused by the acute infection.

https://t.co/MRIFBWWecN
@caulmick @irishdailymail Great advice from the minister off health love it
@caulmick @irishdailymail "sure, it's grand" 👀 health ministers that are not too concerned about illness 👀
